programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Tank Top Lace Trim
programme.desc: Learn how to make a comfortable tank top with Angela!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Turn a Sports Bra to a Tank Top
programme.desc: Lean how to turn your sports bra to a tank top!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Adding Pockets to Joggers
programme.desc: Learn how to add comfortable pockets to your joggers.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Skirt with Pockets
programme.desc: Learn how to make a beautiful skirt with pockets!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Leisure Sports Top
programme.desc: In the next step of her leisure outfit, Angela tackles how to make a perfect criss-cross strap.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Redesigning Fashions
programme.desc: Learn how to re-design a jacket!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Leggings
programme.desc: Learn to make a pair of comfortable and functional leggings.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Tank Top to Back Wrap
programme.desc: Angela Wolf takes a tank top and transforms it into a back wrap.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Bella Knit Top
programme.desc: Angela starts her two part tutorial on how to make a bella knit top: starting with the embroidery!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Embroidered Tank Tee
programme.desc: Learn how to make a tank top without even using a pattern!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Jacket Facing
programme.desc: Learn how to sew jacket facing!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Jacket Sleeves
programme.desc: Angela gives advice on how to make jacket sleeves.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Jeans & Pants That Fit
programme.desc: Want a better fit on your favorite pair of pants? Check out this video to learn how!

programme.title: Invisible Museum Tours: Vincent van Gogh - The Irises
programme.desc: Tour beautiful artworks and learn about artists throughout history in this special series brought to you by Zhenya Gershman.

programme.title: The Last Beekeeper
programme.desc: Other documentaries have done a fantastic job explaining in great detail the scientific nature of CCD. What the Last Beekeeper seeks to do is humanize the bees and tie them to very human stories. CCD is an environmental crisis, but until it hits home on a personal level, there will be no hope for change. After all, the plight of man and the plight of bees have been linked for centuries and at no time in history has that relationship been more strained.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Flattening Workbenches and Wide Boards with a Router
programme.desc: The traditional method for flattening a workbench is to use hand planes and winding sticks. While some folks truly relish this labor of love, others prefer to delegate this grunt work to power tools. The power tool method is very similar to the action of a CNC machine. The router sled is very easy to make from scrap 3/4 inch plywood. The rails can be made from 2 by 6 construction-grade lumber.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Festool CMS Router Table
programme.desc: Festool's new CMS Router Table hits the market in October 2012. Here's a first look at some of the main features and add-ons!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Grizzly Track Saw Review
programme.desc: I really don't have much spare time in my schedule right now but I decided to fast-track (haha, get it? track?) this review so that you can hopefully make a more informed purchase decision if you happen to be interested in this unit.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Greene & Greene Blacker House Chair
programme.desc: The Blacker House was one of the Greene & Greene Ultimate Bungalows built back in 1907. One of the most adored pieces to come out of the Blacker House is the living room chair. Since this project was on my personal bucket list, I took the opportunity to attend the class this past February and this video is the result of that effort.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Greene and Greene Inspired Entry Bench w/ Storage
programme.desc: This is an entry bench that makes a strong statement. Made from mahogany in the Greene & Greene style, this entry bench with storage is sturdy enough to sit on and features ample storage for blankets, shoes, coats, or whatever stuff you might want to shove in there.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Grasshopper Pull Toy
programme.desc: This fun little pull toy is easy to make. The great thing about it is you can get your child involved in the process at whatever level you're comfortable with. Older kids can cut and sand the parts. Younger kids can paint and assemble the grasshoppers.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Glue Caddy
programme.desc: Who wants to keep their glue on a shelf like some kind of medieval peasant? Instead, display your glue in style with a functional and beautiful glue caddy! Honestly, you never know when you're going to be invited to a glue party so having several bottles of glue, glue brushes, and a little water cup onboard means you're ready to glue at a moment's notice.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Get Back Dining Table
programme.desc: The smartest, most durable, fun & useful space-saving table, built using white oak and the Swing-Out Seat Table Hardware Kit from Get Back Inc.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Gaming Dining Table
programme.desc: Nicole and I are big gamers, be they video, dice, cards or classic board games. So when I was tasked with building a new dining table I knew I wanted it to be multi-purpose, serving our needs for meals as well as gaming. And so was born the Gaming Dining Table.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Gaming Coffee Table
programme.desc: A coffee table to doubles as a gaming surface!

programme.title: Knitting Stitch Along: Shadow Mosaic #9
programme.desc: Betty goes over Barbara Walker's Shadow Mosaic #9 in this Stitch Along.

programme.title: The Knit Show: The Color
programme.desc: This episode of The Knit Show with Vickie Howell is our ode to color — intermediate stitch techniques, a look at different types of dyed fibers, and a project that shows off beautifully water-colored yarn!

programme.title: The Knit Show: The Global
programme.desc: On this episode of The Knit Show with Vickie Howell we celebrate our global community by focusing on yarns, techniques, and designers from around the world.

programme.title: The Knit Show: The Multicraftual
programme.desc: It’s rare that a maker has love for only one method, so on this episode of The Knit Show with Vickie Howell we experiment with multi-craftuality — mixing materials, and combining knitting and crochet with sewing, weaving, and more!

programme.title: The Knit Show: The Amigurumi
programme.desc: On this episode of The Knit Show with Vickie Howell we’re all about the super, happy, fun time cuteness of Amigurumi — crochet and knit toys. Learn how to crochet an adorable Loaf Kitty and sweet Sloth, plus tips for toy knitting success!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: One Armed Tee
programme.desc: Learn how to make a one armed tee with Angela!

programme.title: The Stitchery: Coffee. Macrame. Dyeing. Tangents.
programme.desc: Trying to macrame a coffee cup and then dying it with real coffee
